name: Breno Miranda
content: Breno Miranda I have earned my PhD in computer science at the University of Pisa in 2016 and my master degree in computer science at the Federal University of Pernambuco in 2011. My PhD research focused on Coverage Testing and I was advised by Antonia Bertolino. From 2017 to 2019 I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Federal University of Pernambuco under the supervision of Professor Juliano Iyoda. Short CV An Europass CV can be found here.
